mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON rm.`menu_id` = m.`id` WHERE ur.`user_id` = #{userId} and m.`menu_type` IN ('C','F') and m.`status` = 0 AND m.`del_flag` = 0
